SEARCH
Module JBubbleBobble
Package game.model.user

Class User

java.lang.Object
game.model.user.User
public class User extends Object
The class User represents a user in the game with attributes such as nickname, high score, avatar path, points, and statistics for played, won, and lost games. The class provides methods to update these attributes and tracks the user's progress.

  • Constructor Details

    • User

      public User(String nickname, int highScore, String avatarPath, int playedGames, int gamesWon, int gamesLost)
      Constructs a new User with the given attributes.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the user's nickname
      highScore - the user's highest score achieved
      avatarPath - the file path to the user's avatar
      playedGames - the number of games the user has played
      gamesWon - the number of games the user has won
      gamesLost - the number of games the user has lost

      Returns:
      the current points

    • addPoints

      public void addPoints(int pointsAmount)
      Adds a specified amount of points to the user's total points. If the total points exceed the user's high score, the high score is updated and the user's data is saved.
      Parameters:
      pointsAmount - the amount of points to add

    • addLostGame

      public void addLostGame()
      Increments the number of lost games and played games by one, and saves the user's updated data.

    • addWonGame

      public void addWonGame()
      Increments the number of won games and played games by one, and saves the user's updated data.
